mapper.sql: BUSINESS_ID, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_UNIT, TIME_OUT_UNIT, BUSINESS_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER
mapper.select:
select sb.BUSINESS_ID businessId, sb.BUSINESS_NAME businessName, sb.BUSINESS_UNIT businessUnit, sbd.PRICE price, sbd.CASH_PLEDGE cashPledge from share_business sb inner join share_business_detail sbd on sb.BUSINESS_ID = sbd.BUSINESS_ID where sbd.CAR_TYPE = #{carType}
and sb.businessName like concat('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into share_business(BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_UNIT, TIME_OUT_UNIT, BUSINESS_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER) values (#{businessName}, #{businessUnit}, #{timeOutUnit}, #{businessStatus}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:
update share_business
BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName},
BUSINESS_UNIT = #{businessUnit},
TIME_OUT_UNIT = #{timeOutUnit},
BUSINESS_STATUS = #{businessStatus},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser},
where BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId}
